skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Vincenzo Gioberti, the second Alfredo Oriani-class destroyer. I stood shoulder-to-shoulder with valiant cruisers in many battles across¨C Huh? That's not quite right? Okay, my completion was a bit behind, but I was second to be launched among my siblings, so I do qualify as a bona fide big sister!
skins.acquisition: I am Vincenzo Gioberti of Sardegna! ...Eh, my name's hard to remember? ...Hmm, how about just "GB" then? That's a bit easier, right?
skins.login: It's the start of a lively day! Keep at it, Commander! I-I'd better get ready for work too!
skins.details: Anything GB can help you with? I'm the oldest among my siblings and can do absolutely anything! Go on, let's hear it!
skins.secretaryIdle1: S-Simoom isn't around here, is she? Ahem! Not to imply I'm afraid of her, my question simply stems from a sincere desire for amity and courtliness.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Oh goodness! Seriously, could you not pull weird faces while I'm trying to work?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, would you care for a delectable dessert? I personally recommend tiramisu!
skins.secretaryTouch: Huh? I've not done anything weird, have I?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Whuah?! You're a real creep, Commander...
skins.secretaryHeadpat: H-hey! I've grown out of headpats! They don't work on me, nuh-uh!
